title: Tens of thousands of Budget Direct customers overcharged, ASIC alleges
desc: The corporate regulator is taking legal action over allegations Budget Direct customers lost online discounts they were promised and were overcharged.

title: Strange cones from 6,000 years ago reveal early lamp design
desc: Ceramic cones dating back 6,000 years may have been wax lamps that illuminated ancient nighttime rituals for hours.

title: Valverde breaks his assist record
desc: The midfielder has provided nine assists so far this season.

title: Judge sends Shia LaBeouf to rehab after Mardi Gras arrest
desc: A New Orleans judge has ordered actor Shia LaBeouf to return to drug and alcohol rehabilitation and set a $100,000 bond after the film star was charged with two counts of battery.

title: 'Don't know what the fuss was about' - chaotic Palace season could end in glory
desc: Key players have gone, the manager is leaving and has criticised the club and upset fans - yet Crystal Palace's chaotic campaign could still end in European glory.

title: 'Don't know what the fuss was about' - chaotic Palace season could end in glory
desc: Key players have gone, the manager is leaving and has criticised the club and upset fans - yet Crystal Palace's chaotic campaign could still end in European glory.

title: Netflix backs away from offer to buy Warner Bros. after Paramount submits revised bid
desc: Netflix on Thursday signalled it was backing away from its offer to buy Warner Bros. Discovery's streaming and studio assets, saying ‌the deal was no longer financially attractive after Paramount Skydance revised its offer for the coveted Hollywood studio to a $31-a-share offer.

title: Willow Smith Admits 'We're Living In Really Dark Times' In Fiery Viral Speech
desc: Willow Smith, the daughter of Will Smith and Jada Pinkett Smith, is leaning into love, light, and creativity, even as the world feels heavy.

title: Chilliwack school trustee Laurie Throness resigns after $750K hate-speech ruling for Barry Neufeld
desc: ‘I can longer do my job,’ Throness says adding that he doesn’t feel ‘safe’

title: Fil-Am Oscar nominee Autumn Durald Arkapaw lands Vogue PH cover
desc: Filipino-American cinematographer Autumn Durald Arkapaw — nominated for her work on “Sinners” — covers the March issue of Vogue Philippines.
